introduction:
Improve your English vocabulary and listening in just six minutes! 
The amount of waste we produce a

vocabulary.definition: the process of converting waste materials into new materials and objects
vocabulary.example: I make sure to participate in recycling to help reduce environmental impact.

vocabulary.definition: to divide or split different things into distinct categories
vocabulary.example: I always separate my laundry into whites and colors before washing.

vocabulary.definition: dealing with or handling something in a specified way
vocabulary.example: Effective treating of the illness requires a combination of medication and therapy.

vocabulary.definition: a person or company that makes goods for sale
vocabulary.example: The automobile manufacturer is known for producing high-quality vehicles.

vocabulary.definition: the series of stages through which a product passes from its creation to its disposal
vocabulary.example: Understanding the lifecycle of a product helps in making sustainable consumption choices.

vocabulary.definition: a person who purchases goods and services for personal use
vocabulary.example: As a consumer, it's important to be aware of your rights when making purchases.
